## [NARC-1](https://nittany-amateur-radio-club.github.io/station/narc1.html)

- ICOM IC-7610 160-6m 100 W transceiver
- Elecraft KPA-1500 amplifier with ATU
- PC with dual monitors
- ICOM SM-30 desk mic
- Footswitch
- Hallibut Electronics contesting console audio interface

## {background-iframe="https://nittany-amateur-radio-club.github.io/field-day/"}

## What is Field Day?

::: {.incremental}
- a contest
- a social event
- a *field* operating exercise
- an open house for amateur radio
- a ton of fun in the rain & sun
:::

---

- Saturday, June 28 - Sunday, June 29 (2:00 PM EDT - 2:00 PM EDT)
- NARC Clubhouse
  - Class 2 (transmitters) D (Delta), [home/permanent station on mains power](http://www.arrl.org/field-day-rules) 
  - Power: 100 W or 500 W?
  - W3YA callsign
- Food & drink

## Classes

- A: Portable (club/non-club)
- B: Portable (one or two person)
- C: Mobile
- D: Home (licensed or permanent locations on commercial power)
- E: Home (emergency power for radios)
- F: Emergency Operation Centers

## Classes

- A: Portable (club/non-club)
- B: Portable (one or two person)
- C: Mobile
- **D: Home (licensed or permanent locations on commercial power)**
- E: Home (emergency power for radios)
- F: Emergency Operation Centers

## Power multiplier

- 100-500 W: 1x
- 5-100 W: 2x
- <5 W (battery, solar): 5x

## QSO points

- Phone: 1 pt
- CW/Digital: 2 pts

## Club goal-settting

- Exceed 2024 operator total (*n*=13)
- Exceed 2024 attendee total (*n*=24)
- Have 75% of attendees operate (last year = 54%)

## Club goal-setting

- Phone + CW | Digi contacts on 80, 40, 20, 15, 10m

## Any individual goals?

- New modes, bands, radios?

## How you can help

- Help plan, order/buy food & drink
- Help with publicity
- Organize public info table
- Send message to ARRL Section Manager

## How you can help

- Originate 10 messages using standard formats
- Make >= 1 satellite QSO
- Make 5 QSOs on alternative power
- Copy ARRL bulletin

## How you can help

- Plan and execute an educational activity
- Invite local elected official to visit
- Invite members of the public to visit
- Organize a visit by a member from an agency (e.g., Red Cross)
